remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會實作方法介面。This method implements the method of the interface. [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] 呼叫方法來通知 ASP.NET 正在載入應用程式是否支援預先載入。 calls the method to notify ASP.NET whether the application that is being loaded supports preloading. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法只適用於應用程式上執行的[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]。This method applies only to applications that run on [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會實作方法介面。This method implements the method of the interface. 該方法創建一個類型的實例，該實例調用[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]來獲取預加載信息。The method creates an instance of the type, which calls into [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] to get preloading information. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法只適用於應用程式上執行的[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]。This method applies only to applications that run on [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)].
